channel.title: Recruitment
channel.description: Looking for talented people to join your mod, mutator, gametype, game or other project? Then this is the place for you!

item.title: Sound Designer available - high quality and low price
item.author: invalid@example.com (doublereso)
item.dc:creator: doublereso
item.content:encoded:
Hi everybody!

I’m a game sound designer and work for one of the best game-SFX companies. Right now I need an additional freelance income and I decided to make an offer to game developers who need SFX: let me create high-quality custom SFX for your project(s) for a cheap price, but with low speed. If your project has enough time buffer it would be reasonable to consider my offer.

I write out all the benefits that you will get from work with me:
  • High quality SFX designed with the...

Sound Designer available - high quality and low price

item.title: Unreal 4 Artist / Generalist for VR
item.author: invalid@example.com (spine3d Miami)
item.dc:creator: spine3d Miami
item.content:encoded:
Unreal 4 Artist / Generalist for VR

SPINE - Doral, Florida



SPINE is a post-production studio specializing in design-driven visual effects for 3D animation, renderings and interactive environments. We have worked with some of most innovative brands and designers in the industry to help bring their visions to life.

Our company’s fusion of artists, animators, architects, interior designers, and managers is the key to delivering successful digital solutions that are fresh, powerful...

Unreal 4 Artist / Generalist for VR

item.title: ChaosUT4
item.author: invalid@example.com (dr.flay)
item.dc:creator: dr.flay
item.content:encoded:
View attachment 103509 ​
We may be well under way with the new Chaos mod, but we are still looking for talented crew members.
If you want to make maps and models more suited to horror or even medieval worlds, then maybe we have a place for your work.
http://forums.chaoticdreams.org/viewtopic.php?f=8&t=6808

We are now accepting beta testers to help with feedback on the mod and game-play, so you can come and try out our funky relics and the grappling hook....

ChaosUT4

item.title: Calling all Unreal engine 2 modders!
item.author: invalid@example.com (darth_fabar)
item.dc:creator: darth_fabar
item.content:encoded:
Greetings to members of the UT2004 modding community!

We are Running With Scissors, makers for the POSTAL games. POSTAL 2 uses the Unreal engine 2 and also makes use of Steam Workshop. We have been updating both the game and the editor tools for quite some time now, and will continue to do so for the foreseeable future.

The reason we are here telling you all this is because we are currently looking for remotely based interns to join our expanding team, and part of that will be finding...

Calling all Unreal engine 2 modders!

item.title: [UE4] Searching developers for a survival core game production @ Limbic Entertainment
item.author: invalid@example.com (LE-Steuber)
item.dc:creator: LE-Steuber
item.content:encoded:
Hello all,

Are you looking for to work on a survival core game experience in the middle of Germany? Here is your opportunity!

Limbic Entertainment is searching passionate gamers and developers on several roles for our new production team. The main focus of that team will be the development of a Unreal Engine 4 based multiplayer game in the survival genre. Located central in Germany directly next to Frankfurt (Main) we are providing an agile and transparent working environment. We are...

[UE4] Searching developers for a survival core game production @ Limbic Entertainment

item.title: Promo Artist (AAA Video Games Developer) – London, UK – Salary up to £34k DoE
item.author: invalid@example.com (Lee@Amiqus)
item.dc:creator: Lee@Amiqus
item.content:encoded:
This is a genuine opportunity to work with a AAA Games Developer based in the UK, London. If you have any interest in games and Unreal then you will know they are.

They are looking for someone who has excellent experience with Unreal whether it is professional or on a personal basis.

The Job Spec is below... any questions drop me an email or call.

This is a great opportunity to work with one of the UK’s premier AAA Video Games Developers.

The role will primarily involve the...

Promo Artist (AAA Video Games Developer) – London, UK – Salary up to £34k DoE

item.title: UE4 (Indie) - Epoch Games Recruitment
item.author: invalid@example.com (lnsanity)
item.dc:creator: lnsanity
item.content:encoded:
Epoch Games is currently recruiting for additional team-members.

Epoch Games is an all-volunteer team of (currently) 19 members, all of whom are dedicated in our task of making amazing games. Our current project is named Lays of Althas: Sundered Order, more information about which may be found below. Our team is comprised of like-minded individuals who enjoy playing and creating...​

item.title: Unreal Tournament weapons HD remake (temporary name)
item.author: invalid@example.com (Blade_hunter)
item.dc:creator: Blade_hunter
item.content:encoded:
Hello there, we search a good programmer for our mod while I can implement the models and get some kind of basic mutator done I would like a motivated person at replicating UT99's gameplay and feel at least from the gunplay side.

The required capabilities are good knowledge of Uscript obviously, being able to use elements such as textures to make those LED displays and LCD ones on the weapons, and possibly being able to do hud related stuff.

I'm a modeler / animator, while bloodshot...

Unreal Tournament weapons HD remake (temporary name)

item.title: 155/55 LGI
item.author: invalid@example.com (DilleyB)
item.dc:creator: DilleyB
item.content:encoded:
66.55.142.197:7777
If anyone from the olden plays we have this server up and running. It is classic non zp but will be adding zp vote to play as well.
Cheese, Azuka, Skillz, Marko and myself. Trying to round the troops up for more.

Teamspeak 3 server everyone is welcome. 192.111.155.210. No password Dont be afraid to introduce yourself. We got some kids in there for other games but the ones that run it are the adults.

Just dedicated to keeping alive a very cherished part of our...

155/55 LGI

item.title: ∞ÐΣÄ†H Development is hiring [Unpaid/Paid]
item.author: invalid@example.com (Angelofhate)
item.dc:creator: Angelofhate
item.content:encoded:
Infinite Death Development is looking for skilled software engineers, content developers, designers, animators and artists for the game, The Demon Within. We need to get started on the project as soon as possible. So, unfortunately, these positions are currently unpaid, until we complete our funding goals. Our KickStarter Page will go live as soon as there is sufficient content to show. Then if we get the funding we need the positions will become paid (salary will depend on the amount of...

∞ÐΣÄ†H Development is hiring [Unpaid/Paid]

item.title: Thesis Assitance
item.author: invalid@example.com (anonymous.csguy)
item.dc:creator: anonymous.csguy
item.content:encoded:
I'm looking for anyone interested in helping me make an interactive virtual storyteller...for FREE.

I'm hoping to find people with experience in making BSP levels, character design and animation, and especially interaction. I am working on my thesis as a computer science student and I would be very grateful to have anyone to atleast help, regardless of how experienced you are on UDK.

I will not be able to give any monetary value or such for compensation. I can however put you up in my...

Thesis Assitance

item.title: UDK - Sol Contingency [DESCENT]
item.author: invalid@example.com (Bazzwano)
item.dc:creator: Bazzwano
item.content:encoded:
Hello BU members.

As a member of BU and Mapper/Artist working on Sol Contingency I am here to let you know we have a few positions available. I know there are many talented BU mappers/modelers here who we would love to have work with us. We already have some very talented people on board and are looking for a couple more people.

We are currently interested in:
- Mappers
- Modelers
- Texture Artists

You can read more about Sol Contingency and the application process here:...

UDK - Sol Contingency [DESCENT]

item.title: Source Code Purchase
item.author: invalid@example.com (harrel)
item.dc:creator: harrel
item.content:encoded:
We're looking to purchase high quality game source codes to base a new game project off of. If you want to sell us your game source code, then let me know.

We don't care if you keep your game up, but we want a license to be able to edit, improve and build on top of for commercial use.


Thanks
Wayne

Should be an unreal based game.

item.title: Hephaesus Softworks Now Recruiting
item.author: invalid@example.com (Hephaesus)
item.dc:creator: Hephaesus
item.content:encoded:
INTRODUCTION
Hello and thank you for taking your time to take a look at my post. I am looking for someone who is interested to join
Hephaesus Softworks. I am looking for someone who wants to join the team for a long term. We are looking for someone who can work
10 hours a week. Every team members will have freedom. For example, if you're a Programmer and interested to join the team, you can create any gamemode you want. I am not restricting members to...

Hephaesus Softworks Now Recruiting

item.title: Looking for Fulltime Testers for EOD Game in Central NJ
item.author: invalid@example.com (IPKeysJD)
item.dc:creator: IPKeysJD
item.content:encoded:
Hey all,
My name's John Daly and I am the Production Manager for IPKeys Technologies, a Department of Defense company with a video game studio in Eatontown, NJ. We've been working on a training game for EOD and Route Clearance teams in the US Military over the past two years (building the game off the Unreal 3 Engine) and are currently looking to expand our testing department.

Anyone in the Central NJ area looking for a full time gig testing our games and products?

We have a...

Looking for Fulltime Testers for EOD Game in Central NJ

item.title: [non-paid] Indie Team looking for Unrealscript Coder - Critical Point (Tactical FPS)
item.author: invalid@example.com (Sickmind)
item.dc:creator: Sickmind
item.content:encoded:
Dominating Studios is seeking a uscript coder to help us push towards our demo and beta release milestone plans. This is a great opportunity for someone that wants to embed themselves into an indie team and become a core member.

Our project is called Critical Point, a fast semi realistic Tactical Shooter designed for clan and league play (no respawn, no vehicles, no level/powerups etc.) But it's also suitable for...

[non-paid] Indie Team looking for Unrealscript Coder - Critical Point (Tactical FPS)

item.title: Electric Edge: System Shutdown [Staff Needed!]
item.author: invalid@example.com (MrKoor54)
item.dc:creator: MrKoor54
item.content:encoded:
Basic Plot: Electric Edge: System Shutdown takes place inside of a simple computer, except the fact that everything in the game is personified such as files, applications, and programs. Instead of folders and navigation menus, the folders are huge cities and the navigation menus are huge highways leading to the cities (folders). You play as an operating system file (such as windows 8 and windows 7 files) that is sent to investigate a virus...

Electric Edge: System Shutdown [Staff Needed!]

item.title: PRAXIS STUDIOS NEED MORE STAFFS | PROGRAMMER, MODELER, ANIMATOR
item.author: invalid@example.com (EntertainingCams)
item.dc:creator: EntertainingCams
item.content:encoded:
PROGRAMMER, MODELER, AND ANIMATOR NEEDED

ABOUT THE PROJECT

Warzone WW1 is an MMO FPS game that took place in the World War 1 years ( The Great War ). The game is mainly focused on how fun the game is, then realistic graphics. Even though we want the game to be realistic, we still want to put crazy stuff that are fun to do in the game.

Players will have a selection of weapon classes to choose in the game. to get weapon classes, players could...

PRAXIS STUDIOS NEED MORE STAFFS | PROGRAMMER, MODELER, ANIMATOR
